<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>78030</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>f8429cf9-f819-4f74-b5e4-550d013eda0e#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Zsiráf</string>
            <string language="en">Giraffe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Giraffe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Giraffe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Giraffe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Giraffe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Giraffe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Giraffe</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A párosujjú patások közé tartozik. Az afrikai szavannákon honos.</string>
            <string language="en">It belong to even-toed ungulates. Natives on African savannas. </string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">emlősök,  méhlepényesek,  párosujjú patások,  </string>
            <string language="en">Mammalia, Placentalia, even-toed ungulates</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sie gehört gleichmäßig-even-toed ungulates. 
Eingeborene auf afrikanischen savannas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Elle appartiennent aux ungulates égal-bottés 
avec la pointe du pied. Indigènes sur des savannas africains.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pertence aos ungulates uniforme-even-toed. 
Nativos em savannas africanos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Appartiene ai ungulates uniforme-piantati. 
Nativi sui savannas africani.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανήκει ομαλός- ungulates. Ντόπιοι στα 
αφρικανικά savannas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pertenece a los ungulates uniforme-tocados con la 
punta del pie. Naturales en savannas africanos.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mammalia, Placentalia, gleichmäßig-even-toed ungulates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mammalia, Placentalia, ungulates égal-bottés avec la pointe du
pied</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Mammalia, Placentalia, ungulates uniforme-even-toed</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mammalia, Placentalia, ungulates uniforme-piantati</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το Mammalia, Placentalia, ομαλός- ungulates</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mammalia, Placentalia, ungulates uniforme-tocados con la punta 
del pie</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>

          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>

          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>

            </role>

version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>

              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>

            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0

        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
